com.mozilla.secops

Class GcsUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mozilla.secops.GcsUtil

  • public final class GcsUtil
extends Object
    Utilities for requesting content from Google Cloud Storage

        public static com.google.cloud.storage.BlobId blobIdFromUrl(String input)
        Return a storage BlobId given a storage input URL
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        public static byte[] fetchContent(String inputUrl)
        Fetch byte array from specified storage URL
        Parameters:
        inputUrl - Input URL, e.g., gs://bucket/path
        Returns:
        Byte array or null of not found or an error occurs

      • fetchStringContent

        public static String fetchStringContent(String inputUrl)
        Fetch string content from specified storage URL
        Parameters:
        inputUrl - Input URL, e.g., gs://bucket/path
        Returns:
        Trimmed string or null if not found or an error occurs
